/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The street, bathed in the soft glow of the sun, is flanked by lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding to the serene ambiance of the scene. The perspective of the image is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm, inviting light.
